nodes.text: Star Wars 8 is the eighth issue of the canon comic series Star Wars. The comic was written by Charles Soule, illustrated by Ramon Rosanas, and published by Marvel Comics on November 4, 2020.
The issue features the story "The Will of Tarkin Part II: Prey," in which Commander Ellian Zahra confronts Princess Leia Organa, as the Alliance Fleet battles the Imperial Navy.
TO ESCAPE THE EMPIRE'S TRAP, THE REBELS SPRING ONE OF THEIR OWN!
